SELECT ITEM_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO ITEM (ITEM_ID, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_DATE, ITEM_CONT, ITEM_SUB, ITEM_COMP, ITEM_LOC, ITEM_200, ITEM_500, ITEM_CAF, ITEM_TASTE, ITEM_TYPE, SELL_ID ) VALUES (#{ITEM_ID}, #{ITEM_NAME}, SYSDATE, #{ITEM_CONT}, #{ITEM_SUB}, #{ITEM_COMP}, #{ITEM_LOC}, #{ITEM_200}, #{ITEM_500}, #{ITEM_CAF}, #{ITEM_TASTE}, #{ITEM_TYPE}, #{SELL_ID} )
INSERT INTO FOLDER ( FILE_NUM, ITEM_ID, FILE_ORG, FILE_STD, FILE_SIZE, FILE_DATE ) VALUES ( FILE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{ITEM_ID}, #{FILE_ORG}, #{FILE_STD}, #{FILE_SIZE}, SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE ITEM SET ITEM_NAME = #{ITEM_NAME}, ITEM_CONT = #{ITEM_CONT}, ITEM_SUB = #{ITEM_SUB}, ITEM_COMP = #{ITEM_COMP}, ITEM_LOC = #{ITEM_LOC}, ITEM_200 = #{ITEM_200}, ITEM_500 = #{ITEM_500}, ITEM_CAF = #{ITEM_CAF}, ITEM_TASTE = #{ITEM_TASTE}, ITEM_TYPE = #{ITEM_TYPE} WHERE ITEM_ID = #{ITEM_ID}
UPDATE FOLDER SET FILE_ORG = #{FILE_ORG}, FILE_STD = #{FILE_STD}, FILE_SIZE = #{FILE_SIZE} WHERE ITEM_ID = #{ITEM_ID} AND FILE_NUM = #{FILE_NUM}
UPDATE ITEM SET ITEM_DEL='Y' WHERE ITEM_ID = #{ITEM_ID}
UPDATE FOLDER SET FILE_DEL='Y' WHERE ITEM_ID = #{ITEM_ID}

SELECT * FROM REVIEW WHERE RE_ITEM = #{RE_ITEM} ORDER BY RE_REF, RE_STEP

mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, ITEM_ID, ITEM_200, ITEM_500, ITEM_NAME, SELL_ID, ITEM_DEL, FILE_STD, ITEM_DATE FROM (SELECT ITEM_ID, ITEM_200, ITEM_500, ITEM_NAME, SELL_ID, ITEM_DEL, FILE_STD, TO_CHAR(ITEM_DATE, 'YY.MM.DD') AS ITEM_DATE FROM (SELECT NUM, I.ITEM_ID, ITEM_200, ITEM_500, ITEM_DATE, ITEM_NAME, SELL_ID, ITEM_DEL FROM (SELECT MIN(FILE_NUM) AS NUM, ITEM_ID FROM FOLDER WHERE FILE_DEL = 'N' GROUP BY ITEM_ID) F, ITEM I WHERE F.ITEM_ID = I.ITEM_ID) A INNER JOIN (SELECT FILE_NUM, FILE_STD FROM FOLDER) B ON A.NUM = B.FILE_NUM WHERE SELL_ID = #{SELL_ID} AND ITEM_DEL='N' ORDER BY ITEM_ID DESC) ORDER BY RN) WHERE RN BETWEEN (#{nowPage}*5-4) AND (#{nowPage}*5)
